meanings.definition: Excessive cleverness or skill in devising or executing something.
meanings.sent1: Her overingenuity in solving puzzles often left others amazed.
meanings.sent2: The inventor's overingenuity led to a complex but impractical design.
meanings.sent3: His overingenuity in creating a new recipe resulted in a dish no one wanted to eat.
meanings.sent4: The overingenuity of the escape plan made it nearly impossible to execute.
meanings.sent5: The overingenuity of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being overly ingenious.
meanings.sent1: The project's failure was attributed to the team's overingenuity.
meanings.sent2: The overingenuity of the plan made it difficult to implement within the given timeframe.
meanings.sent3: The overingenuity of the costume design made the actors uncomfortable on stage.
meanings.sent4: The overingenuity of the marketing campaign resulted in confusing messages to the customers.
meanings.sent5: The overingenuity of the architect's design left the building structurally unsound.
